p: EPL (molecular weight of 414.49 g/mol) is a crystalline powder that is slightly soluble in water (<1 mg/mL). It has a high octanol/water partition coefficient (log Kow = 7.1 at pH 7.0). EPL is a BCS Class II drug (low solubility and high permeability) of low bioavailability that is significantly affected by drug solubility [ 12].
